DOC.brief_summary: The study is performed to collect long-term data on the treatment adherence and patient's acceptability when Zomacton®10 mg is administered with the Zomajet® Vision X device in patients with a growth hormone deficiency or Turner's syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Adherence and the Patient Acceptability of Zomacton® Treatment With the Zomajet® Vision X Device
DOC.criteria: Patient with growth hormone deficiency, 1. Diagnosis of growth hormone deficiency proven by appropriate exploration 2. Size ≤ 2 Standard Deviation (SD) according to the French references 3. Growth velocity in the previous year inferior to the normal for age (1SD) or < 4cm/year Growth deficiency due to Turner's syndrome 1. Turner's syndrome confirmed by a karyotype 2. Patient's size ≤ 2 SD according to the French references 3. Bone age < 12 years Patient who require a minimum of 18 months of treatment. There are no exclusion criteria except the contraindication for Zomacton® 10 mg
